text: Zvirokwazvo, muchawana vanhu vanovenga vanotenda (maMuslim) zvakasimba vari maJudha neavo vanosanganisa zvimwe zvinamatwa naAllah; uye zvirokwazvo muchawana vanhu vari pedyo muushamwari nevanotenda (maMuslim) vari avo vanoti: “Tiri maKristu.” Nekuda kwekuti pakati pavo pane vafundisi nevadzidzi, uye havazvitutumadzi
